title: The Dew of Their Youth
author: Crockett, S. R. (Samuel Rutherford)
snippet: And as she came nearer, she did not hold out her hand, nor greet me--but when she was quite close she said, exactly as in the dream, "I have found the Little House round the Corner!" Yet she had never heard of my dream before.

title: When winter comes to Main street,
author: Overton, Grant Martin
snippet: Christopher Morley is too well-known as a poet to require any explicit account in this place. I shall remind you of the pleasure of reading him by quoting the "Song For a Little House" from his book, The Rocking Horse, and also a short verse from his Translations from the Chinese.

title: Shandygaff :
author: Morley, Christopher
snippet: Reputed also to be the Authour of "Parnassus on Wheels," and "Songs for a Little House"
